item.title: Player rights/cannon
item.dc:creator: @RSC_n33b RSC_n33b
item.description:
@RSC_n33b wrote:

or

case 5975:
if(objectX == 3661 && objectY == 3522)
{
if (playerRights == 1 || playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3))
{
attackPlayersWithin(30, 23, 25);
stillgfx(280, absY, absX);
sendMessage("You Shoots The cannon your hands start to shake!.");
}
else if (playerRights <1)
{
sendMessage("You must have mod status to use the cannon!");
}
}
break;

alright one sec i will test and give results[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 12:14:15 AM[/size][hr]thanks alot [quote="-Legend-, post:3, topic:191642"]I’ll try.

case 5975:
if(objectX == 3661 && objectY == 3522)
{
if (playerRights == 3)
{
attackPlayersWithin(30, 23, 25);
stillgfx(280, absY, absX);
sendMessage("You Shoots The cannon your hands start to shake!.");
}
else if(playerRights < 3)
{
sendMessage("You must be the owner to use the cannon!");
}
}
break;

That should do.[/quote]

stillgfx(280, absY, absX);

                {

                stillgfx(280, absY, absX);
